title: Lavender and tea shortbread biscuits
description: Lady Grey tea is a less strong, more floral version of Earl Grey. Here the leaves are removed from the bag to flavor a classic shortbread biscuit.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1½ tsp dried lavender, ground (ensure it has been produced specifically for eating)
2 Lady Grey teabags, leaves only (or 1 tsp tea leaves, ground)
